sentences.en: Taking cornstalk as raw material to produce newsprint, domestic paper etc. elaborately and profoundly processed projects.
sentences.cn: 以玉米秸秆为原料生产新闻用纸 、 生活用纸等产品的精深加工项目.

sentences.en: The most part of cornstalk is used as fuel, secondly as feedstuff, then as fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 燃料是吉林省玉米秸秆消耗量最大的一部分，其次是饲料，再次是肥料。

words.tran_cn: 谷类的；粗野的；陈腐的；乡下味的
